title: LiveSmart AI Video Dashboard
name: Name
left_blank_changed: (If left blank will not be changed)
select_logout: Select "Logout" below if you are ready to end your current session.
new_lsv_version: There is a new version of LiveSmart AI Video:
fillin_purchase_code: Please fill in your purchase code below
product_not_activated: Your LiveSmart instance is not activated
product_updated: Your LiveSmart is updated to the latest release
product_updated_zip: Your folders are backed up in zip files, so if something is wrong you can take your old files from there.
update_location: Click here to update to the latest release
update_info:
By providing your purchase code below, you will get from our servers the latest release of LiveSmart. The system will also do a backup of your current folders, but we recommend you also to do this manually.
If setting files like /server/connect.php or /locales/en_US.json are due to update, they will not be overwritten, but added as connect.php.new or en_US.json.new, so you can compare and update options manually.
avatar_url: URL is copied in your clipboard and can be shared
avatars_ai_info: You can choose an avatar from here. Click on an avatar for a preview video. For more information please check HeyGen and documentation page.
room_ai: Room ID. Unique URL of the room. If not specified it gets a random string.
avatar_system: Avatar attitude. From here you instruct the avatar how to respond, behave and understand its role in the conversation.
locales_info: From this section you make changes to the localizations or add a new ones.
error_locale_save: Error while saving the locale file.
openai_key_info: Steps to get the key: 1. Go to https://platform.openai.com/; 2. Create your account; 3. Generate your APIKey
openai_model_info: Defines the behavior and the model of your Open AI. Check your OpenAI account for available models
heygen_key_info: You can get the key from your account in HeyGen.com, Account - Space Settings - API
advanced_tools_info: Check the documentation for more information on how to use advanced functions
tools_name: Name of the function. You need to have this function in server/toolCalls.php file
tools_description: Instructions for the avatar when the function will be called, i.e. "Get the current weather in a given location"
tools_parameters: Parameters passed to the function, separated by comma
voices_ai_info: Choose from listed voices based on your native language preferences.
ai_greeting_text: The avatar will start the conversation with this text if provided
is_context: Keep context of the conversation. If checked response may be slower
assitants_info: You can choose to use here predefined assistants from your OpenAI dashboard. If you choose an assistant from here, above advanced chat settings will not be used. Please have in mind that using assistant may lead to more credits usage and delays in the answers.
need_subscribe: You need to subscribe now.
payment_enabled: Payment is enabled for this tenant
payment_enabled_info: Payments can be enabled only with Extended licenses.
ai_layout: Layout. Content oriented is locking the chat and avatar on the right, while the main screen is for content generated.
video_ai_suggestions: Predefined phrases to be shown as examples for interaction suggestions, separated by comma.
ai_datetime: Date/Time and duration of a meeting. If date is not set, the duration will start the moment meeting begins
subscribe_package_left: minutes left in your subscription package.
avatars_ai_audio_info: You can choose a voice only avatar from here. If you do not have Eleven Lab token, it will use the default voice synthesis from the browser.
is_audio: Check this if you want voice only avatar. This will ignore video avatar.
elevenlabs_key_info: You can get the key from ElevenLabs, create an account, go to elevenlabs.io, My Account - API Keys
custom_avatar_id: ID of a custom avatar. Do not fill if you don't have one from HeyGen
custom_voice_id: ID of a custom voice. Do not fill if you don't have one from HeyGen
inactivity_timeout: Exit of system after seconds of inactivity
